name: ChiRQA
short_description:
Conflict/Background info: Protagonist & Antagonist They went to high school together
& later Gets into it over money that was owed by the protagonist
he later returns the money but the antagonist doesn't think that it is good enough, he decides to 
go against him in everything he does to become better which is never really done. Through out 
their history he never really finds nothing to get him on until now..He decides to kidnap  the
protagonist girlfriend so he can find finally beat him at his own game, not realizing that this will only anger
him into coming to find her and making her his again. This has all happened because the protagonist is self centered and thinks the world should abide by what he wants.
